mapper.select: SELECT products.product_name, SUM(payments_detail.selling_price) AS selling_price, payments.payment_date FROM payments_detail INNER JOIN products ON payments_detail.product_id = products.product_id INNER JOIN payments ON payments_detail.payment_id = payments.payment_id GROUP BY products.product_name, payments.payment_date ORDER BY selling_price DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT products.product_name, SUM(payments_detail.selling_price) AS selling_price, payments.payment_date FROM payments_detail INNER JOIN products ON payments_detail.product_id = products.product_id INNER JOIN payments ON payments_detail.payment_id = payments.payment_id WHERE payments.payment_date BETWEEN #{trfirstSelectedDate} AND #{trlastSelectedDate} GROUP BY products.product_name, payments.payment_date ORDER BY selling_price DESC LIMIT 5;
